channel.title: CVE Feed for Zoom Video Communications Inc -- Zoom Client for Meetings for Ubuntu Linux
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zoom Video Communications Inc -- Zoom Client for Meetings for Ubuntu Linux

item.title: CVE-2021-34419|2024-08-04T00:12:50.022Z -- zoom%20video%20communications%20inc -- zoom%20client%20for%20meetings%20for%20ubuntu%20linux
item.description: In the Zoom Client for Meetings for Ubuntu Linux before version 5.1.0, there is an HTML injection flaw when sending a remote control request to a user in the process of in-meeting screen sharing. This could allow meeting participants to be targeted for social engineering attacks.
